    This method is used by the seller client to close the auction of the item given by the user (via the auction ID) We ensure that this is the same user that created the auction by also getting the username and password of the user who tried to close the auction.

  • Method Details

    • getSpec

      public AuctionItem getSpec​(int itemId, int clientId)
      Description copied from interface: Item
      This code was used for Stage 1 of the coursework. This function returns the auction item with the auction ID (itemId) supplied by the client user. It is used by the original client.
      Specified by:
      getSpec in interface Item
      Parameters:
      itemId - this is an integer for the item ID that the user wants to see the details of
      clientId - this is the client id of the user
      Returns:
      the auction item that matches the given ID

    • createAuctionItem

      public int createAuctionItem​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, int startingPrice, int reservePrice)
      Description copied from interface: Item
      This method is used by the seller client. It creates an auction item and adds it to the list of items actively being auctioned.
      Specified by:
      createAuctionItem in interface Item
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user who creates the auction item
      password - the password of the user who creates the auction item
      title - the title of the item
      description - the description of the item
      startingPrice - the starting price of the item
      reservePrice - the item reserve price
      Returns:
      returns the auctionID of the item that was created

    • closeItemAuction

      public java.lang.String closeItemAuction​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, int auctionIdInput)
      Description copied from interface: Item
      This method is used by the seller client to close the auction of the item given by the user (via the auction ID) We ensure that this is the same user that created the auction by also getting the username and password of the user who tried to close the auction.
      Specified by:
      closeItemAuction in interface Item
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user trying to close the auction
      password - the password of the user trying to close the auction
      auctionIdInput - the auction ID of the item that the user wants to close
      Returns:

    • browseItems

      public java.lang.String browseItems()
      Description copied from interface: Item
      This method is used by the buyer client to browse all the items currently active in the auction list
      Specified by:
      browseItems in interface Item
      Returns:
      returns all the active items in the auction list in a string format

    • bidForItem

      public java.lang.String bidForItem​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String emailAddress, int auctionId, int bidAmount)
      Description copied from interface: Item
      This method is used by the buyer client to bid for a particular item.
      Specified by:
      bidForItem in interface Item
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user who is bidding for the item
      emailAddress - the email address of the user who is bidding for the item
      auctionId - the auctionID for the item that they would like to bid on
      bidAmount - the amount that they would like to bid
      Returns:
      returns the response from the server in a string format, e.g. the current highest bid along with the amount bidded, or any exceptions

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
